attributes.action: honour the promise made to the Electorate to have a Referendum on the new treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that the men and women who have given their lives in the service of their country in the many different wars and conflicts deserve better than to give up all that they fought for, to keep Britain free, to an unelected body of unknown people who can then tell us what we can and cannot do.I think it is against all the so called principles of democracy.Lives given to protect our Nation all for nothing.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
